meanings.def: having the colour of smoke or ashes

examples: The sky looks very gray. I think it's going to rain.

meanings.def: pale, because they are ill, tired or sad
examples: The next morning she looked very gray and hollow-eyed.
His face was gray with pain.

meanings.def: without interest or variety; making you feel sad
examples: Life seems gray and pointless without him.
The company was full of faceless gray men who all looked the same.

meanings.def: the colour of smoke or ashes
examples: the dull gray of the sky
His eyes are a dark gray.
The adult male's wings are of light gray.
an exquisite range of soft grays
His hair was greying at the sides.
a tall woman with greying hair
